headline: Analysis-For stock market, AI turns from lifting all boats to sinking ships
summary: Investors are discovering that the artificial intelligence landscape is not just fertile ground for stocks -- it is also a minefield.  Enthusiasm about AI's profitability has fueled the U.S. bull market, with stock gains for technology companies and others tied to the build-out of data centers ‌and related infrastructure.  Many investors have also pointed to 2026 as the year AI will start boosting bottom lines more broadly, as companies see productivity benefits.

headline: OpenAI Insurance Apps Test Arthur J. Gallagher’s Brokerage Model And Fees
summary: OpenAI has launched insurance-native AI tools that let customers compare and purchase policies directly. These applications target complex policy matching and buying, which sits at the core of Arthur J. Gallagher's brokerage role. The development raises the risk of brokers being cut out of the transaction process, putting high commission revenue under pressure. For Arthur J. Gallagher (NYSE:AJG), this launch goes right to the center of its traditional brokerage model, where human...
